titleStmt.title: Be it knowen to all cristen people, that where ther is ... [p]orche of the Cathedrall Churche of Hareforde ...
titleStmt.author: Hereford Cathedral. Porch and Chantry Chapel.
Wolsey, Thomas, 1475?-1530.
Campeggi, Lorenzo, 1474-1539.
Catholic Church. aut

notesStmt.note: Imprint and conjectured publication date from STC.
Indulgence issued by Cardinals Wolsey and Campeggio, papal legates--STC.
Identified as STC 13195 on UMI microfilm.
Imperfect; creased and stained, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in Marsh's Library.
